articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) has released a hauntingly beautiful image of the surface of Mars, showing how the landscape there is sculpted by winds.

articles.title: New planet detected around star closest to the Sun - The Tribune
articles.description: A team of astronomers using the European Southern Observatory's Very Large Telescope (ESO's VLT) in Chile have found evidence of another planet orbiting Proxima Centauri, the closest star to our Solar System.

articles.title: Ukraine sees 'no point' in closing its airspace, as airlines consider suspending flights - ABC News
